targets.rawSql:
WITH sensor_stats AS (
  SELECT
    sensor_id,
    count(*) AS total_count,
    sum(if(status = 'Normal', 1, 0)) AS normal_count
  FROM sensor_logs_db.sensor_logs
  WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp)
        AND sensor_id IN ($sensor_id)
        AND data_center IN ($data_center)
        AND product IN ($product)
  GROUP BY sensor_id
)
SELECT
  sensor_id,
  (normal_count / CAST(total_count AS Float64)) * 100 AS percentage_normal
FROM sensor_stats
ORDER BY sensor_id ASC

panels.title: Sensor Health Percentage for Each Sensor

targets.rawSql:
WITH status_counts AS (
  SELECT 
    sensor_id,
    sum(if(status = 'Normal', 1, 0)) AS Normal,
    sum(if(status = 'Critical', 1, 0)) AS Critical,
    sum(if(status NOT IN ('Normal', 'Critical'), 1, 0)) AS Other
  FROM sensor_logs_db.sensor_logs
  WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp)
        AND sensor_id IN ($sensor_id)
        AND data_center IN ($data_center)
        AND product IN ($product)
  GROUP BY sensor_id
)
SELECT
  sensor_id,
  Normal,
  Critical,
  Other
FROM status_counts
ORDER BY sensor_id ASC;

WITH latest_sensor_log AS (
  SELECT 
	JSONExtractString(metadata, 'machine_status') AS machine_status,
	metadata
  FROM sensor_logs_db.sensor_logs
  WHERE sensor_id = 'sensor-001'
        AND $__timeFilter(timestamp)
        AND sensor_id IN ($sensor_id)
        AND data_center IN ($data_center)
        AND product IN ($product)
  ORDER BY timestamp DESC
  LIMIT 1
)
SELECT 
  machine_status AS "Machine Status",
  CASE 
    WHEN machine_status = 'Start' THEN JSONExtractString(metadata, 'uptime')
    WHEN machine_status = 'Stop'  THEN JSONExtractString(metadata, 'downtime')
  END AS "Status Time"
FROM latest_sensor_log;

WITH latest_sensor_log AS (
  SELECT 
	JSONExtractString(metadata, 'machine_status') AS machine_status,
	metadata
  FROM sensor_logs_db.sensor_logs
  WHERE sensor_id = 'sensor-002'
        AND $__timeFilter(timestamp)
        AND sensor_id IN ($sensor_id)
        AND data_center IN ($data_center)
        AND product IN ($product)
  ORDER BY timestamp DESC
  LIMIT 1
)
SELECT 
  machine_status,
  CASE 
    WHEN machine_status = 'Start' THEN JSONExtractString(metadata, 'uptime')
    WHEN machine_status = 'Stop'  THEN JSONExtractString(metadata, 'downtime')
  END AS metadata_time
FROM latest_sensor_log;

        AND $__timeFilter(timestamp)

        AND product IN ($product)

SELECT 
  machine_status,
  CASE

    WHEN machine_status = 'Stop'  THEN JSONExtractString(metadata, 'downtime')

SELECT
  toStartOfMinute(timestamp) AS time,
  avg(measurement) AS "Temperature",
  sensor_id
FROM sensor_logs_db.sensor_logs
WHERE 
  $__timeFilter(timestamp)
  AND type = 'Temperature Sensor'
  AND sensor_id IN ($sensor_id)
  AND data_center IN ($data_center)
  AND product IN ($product)
GROUP BY time, sensor_id
ORDER BY time ASC

SELECT 
    AVG(measurement) AS "Average Celsius",
    MAX(measurement) AS "Maximum Celsius",
    MIN(measurement) AS "Minimum Celsius"
  FROM sensor_logs_db.sensor_logs
  WHERE 
    $__timeFilter(timestamp)
    AND type = 'Temperature Sensor'
    AND sensor_id IN ($sensor_id)
    AND data_center IN ($data_center)
    AND product IN ($product)

WITH aggregated AS (
  SELECT
    toStartOfMinute(timestamp) AS minute,
    avg(measurement) AS avg_temperature,
    avg(duration) AS avg_duration
  FROM sensor_logs_db.sensor_logs
  WHERE
    $__timeFilter(timestamp)
    AND type = 'Temperature Sensor'
    AND sensor_id IN ($sensor_id)
    AND data_center IN ($data_center)
    AND product IN ($product)
  GROUP BY minute
)
SELECT
  avg_duration AS "Duration",
  avg_temperature AS "Temperature"
FROM aggregated
ORDER BY minute ASC
